title: Kayak Summer Specials
subheader: 2 for 1! Buy one tour get one free!
body:
Beat the heat with our kayak specials. 2 for 1 special applies to the following 3 tours:

* [Harbor Kayak Tour](/tours/harbor-kayak-tour)
* [Coastal Kayak Tour](/tours/coastal-kayak-tour)
* [Champagne Kayak Tour](/tours/champagne-kayak-tour)

Captain Jack is excited to offer these "COOL" summer tours, choose your tour and book online.
